abilities.name: Insanity.
abilities.description: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Narrak is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (Save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks) Narrak has two 2nd-level spell slots, which he regains after finishing a short or long rest, and knows the following Warlock spells:>>>
Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast, friends, poison spray
1st level: armor of Agathys, charm person, hex
2nd level: hold person, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
